# Chemist SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#42636d][bold]Chemist[/bold][/color] of this station.
1. The Chemist must ensure that the Medical Fridge is stocked with at least enough medication to handle Brute, Burn, Airloss, Toxic, and Cellular damage. Failure to follow this Guideline or attempting to follow this Guideline within thirty (30) minutes is to be considered a breach of Standard Operating Procedure.
2. The Chemist is not obligated to fulfill crew requests if medication for Medical is yet to be made.
3. The Chemist is not permitted to experiment with explosive mixtures, poisonous mixtures, and/or narcotics.
4. The Chemist is not allowed to leave Chemistry unattended if the Medical Fridge is devoid of Medication, except in such a case that Chemistry is unusable.
5. The Chemist is expected to follow the same guidelines as the [color=#42636d][bold]Medical Doctor[/bold][/color] when conducting similar procedures as such.
